name: Don Froelich
text: Very good place to get powder coating done. I'm a welder and have been taking projects to Windsor's for many years.

name: Moses Brown
text: There aren’t word to describe the impeccable service/great family atmosphere that Mr Windsor and his Staff exhibit that I’ll continue to travel from Huntsville to have my projects done.....period....truly a ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Operation................“Keep up the Great works..SFC M. Brown US Army (Retired)

name: David Flanary
text: Great service and product from this family owned and operated business! Always honest and fair in every aspect of their work!

name: Mel Cowan
text: These guys are the greatest! Very professional, and will go out of their way to please any customer. I just love how they give a personal touch to every thing they touch!

name: John RISTINE
text: Great

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Nice employees but I hate going to this dirty place. Thats not anyone's fault though its the nature of this industry.

name: Britt Lands
text: Receiving is spot on shipping can b a little slow sometimes but over all my experience has been good. Be there again next day r so

name: Mike McCombs
text: Much improved was in loaded and out in 20 minutes gerat job guys thanks for the great service

name: Marshall Mcgrew
text: Very easy to get along with will help any way they can 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

name: Michael walker
text: Great service

name: William White
text: There is a wait some days,but the shipping department is always very helpful,if you speak to a supervisor. Office staff are knowledgeable and if something is missing they will find it immediately. The work is quality.They could use more room though.

name: Billy Thomason
text: My plate of metal was galvanized to perfection

name: Rick Meeks
text: Every time I come you better bring your breakfast  lunch and snacks in the truck.... I don't know what goes on but you can count on hours and hours of wait time..... nobody won't tell you nothing

name: Thomas Tolliver
text: Fantastic Machine Shop with great customer service and even better pricing.  Truly a wonderful addition to the Alabama machine and steel services.

name: Farontha Booker
text: Super friendly staff was more than helpful to get a driver there.

name: Darryl Brown
text: I feel that the people I work with(management and employees)are good people,but the company refuses to pay appropriate wages and also advance wages appropriately

name: Sculea Semion
text: Nice people! Fast loading

name: Araldo Perez Jr
text: For flatbed fellow trucker picking up here is piece of cake!! super friendly loader guys and the faster ever seeing, load hyper fast with dunnage included, in and out in like 45 mn, cool girl in shipping, hope load more often here.

name: Freddy Stanford
text: Got loaded out super fast!

name: Leordan Carli
text: Good place
